column6: "PRISONERS OF THE PUPPET MASTER"  Enter the Puppet Master, an evil mastermind who has learned to control people using action figures.  Check out this new all-ages adventure of The Fantastic Four based on the original classic stories!
column8: | penciller:Joseph Dodd | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | inker:Justin Holman | penciller (cover):Makoto Nakatsuka | letterer:Dave Sharpe
